amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to strike section 1023 of the bill prohibiting the use of funds to construct or modify facilities in the United States to house detainees transferred from Guantanamo Bay.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
